artifacts.title: Resilient Distributed Operations Across Remote Sites
artifacts.description:
As UAE AFAD Mission Operators, 

- We need enhanced network connectivity and power/transport resilience at remote sites to enable seamless site-to-site coordination and failover during threats 
- So that we can maintain mission continuity and rapid response in multi-domain environments, such as drone swarm detections.
artifacts.owner: Air Force and Air Defence Commander
artifacts.rationale: Supports AFAD's mission objectives by ensuring distributed assets (e.g., radars, SHORADS) operate reliably, building on TRP1's core modernization to extend capabilities to 280 sites.

artifacts.title: Standardized Infrastructure Management for Enterprise Efficiency
artifacts.description:
As UAE AFAD Enterprise Commanders, 

- We need virtualized compute standardization and multi-security domain support across remote sites to consolidate configurations and enable centralized monitoring/patching 
- So that we can achieve enterprise-wide scalability, reduce maintenance silos, and support joint operations (e.g., with Navy C4I).
artifacts.rationale: Enhances AFAD's organizational efficiency by standardizing diverse site types, extending TRP1's SIEM/ELK integrations for remote oversight and compliance.

artifacts.title: Secure and Future-Proof Technical Upgrades
artifacts.description:
As UAE AFAD Technical Specialists, 

- We need secure wireless access, encryptor/firewall upgrades, and preplanned transport integrations (e.g., 5G/LEO) at remote sites 
- So that we can ensure technical compliance, modularity for emerging transports, and isolated domains without operational disruptions.
artifacts.rationale: Provides AFAD with technical foundations for resilience, building on TRP1's cybersecurity and network tools to future-proof infrastructure against harsh environments and threats.
